LanguageData.RockMill.label: rock mill
LanguageData.RockMill.description: An electrically-powered mill for crushing and mixing rocks, sand and dirt.
LanguageData.RockMill_Blueprint.label: rock mill (blueprint)
LanguageData.RockMill_Blueprint_Install.label: rock mill (blueprint)
LanguageData.RockMill_Frame.label: rock mill (building)
LanguageData.RockMill_Frame.description: An electrically-powered mill for crushing and mixing rocks, sand and dirt.
LanguageData.RFFConcreteDoor.label: steel-reinforced concrete door
LanguageData.RFFConcreteDoor.description: Divides rooms. Must be manually opened and closed, which slows people down.
LanguageData.RFFConcreteDoor_Blueprint.label: steel-reinforced concrete door (blueprint)
LanguageData.RFFConcreteDoor_Frame.label: steel-reinforced concrete door (building)
LanguageData.RFFConcreteDoor_Frame.description: Divides rooms. Must be manually opened and closed, which slows people down.
LanguageData.RFFConcreteAutodoor.label: steel-reinforced concrete autodoor
LanguageData.RFFConcreteAutodoor.description: Divides rooms. Powered operation allows people to move through the door without slowing down.
LanguageData.RFFConcreteAutodoor_Blueprint.label: steel-reinforced concrete autodoor (blueprint)
LanguageData.RFFConcreteAutodoor_Frame.label: steel-reinforced concrete autodoor (building)
LanguageData.RFFConcreteAutodoor_Frame.description: Divides rooms. Powered operation allows people to move through the door without slowing down.
LanguageData.RFFPlasticreteDoor.label: plasteel-reinforced concrete door
LanguageData.RFFPlasticreteDoor.description: Divides rooms. Must be manually opened and closed, which slows people down.
LanguageData.RFFPlasticreteDoor_Blueprint.label: plasteel-reinforced concrete door (blueprint)
LanguageData.RFFPlasticreteDoor_Frame.label: plasteel-reinforced concrete door (building)
LanguageData.RFFPlasticreteDoor_Frame.description: Divides rooms. Must be manually opened and closed, which slows people down.
LanguageData.RFFPlasticreteAutodoor.label: plasteel-reinforced concrete autodoor
LanguageData.RFFPlasticreteAutodoor.description: Divides rooms. Powered operation allows people to move through the door without slowing down.
LanguageData.RFFPlasticreteAutodoor_Blueprint.label: plasteel-reinforced concrete autodoor (blueprint)
LanguageData.RFFPlasticreteAutodoor_Frame.label: plasteel-reinforced concrete autodoor (building)
LanguageData.RFFPlasticreteAutodoor_Frame.description: Divides rooms. Powered operation allows people to move through the door without slowing down.
LanguageData.RFFConcreteWall.label: poured concrete wall
LanguageData.RFFConcreteWall.description: A concrete wall, stronger than standard stone walls.
LanguageData.RFFConcreteWall_Blueprint.label: poured concrete wall (blueprint)
LanguageData.RFFConcreteWall_Frame.label: poured concrete wall (building)
LanguageData.RFFConcreteWall_Frame.description: A concrete wall, stronger than standard stone walls.
LanguageData.RFFReinforcedConcreteWall.label: steel-reinforced concrete wall
LanguageData.RFFReinforcedConcreteWall.description: A reinforced concrete wall. Much stronger than standard concrete or stone walls, it's well suited to use in bunkers and other high-security fortified locations.
LanguageData.RFFReinforcedConcreteWall_Frame.label: steel-reinforced concrete wall (building)
LanguageData.RFFReinforcedConcreteWall_Frame.descript: A reinforced concrete wall. Much stronger than standard concrete or stone walls, it's well suited to use in bunkers and other high-security fortified locations.
LanguageData.RFFPlasticreteWall.label: plasteel-reinforced concrete wall
LanguageData.RFFPlasticreteWall.description: The ultimate in defensive fortifications, this massive reinforced wall is constructed from layers of concrete, steel and plasteel.
LanguageData.RFFPlasticreteWall_Blueprint.label: plasteel-reinforced concrete wall (blueprint)
LanguageData.RFFPlasticreteWall_Frame.label: plasteel-reinforced concrete wall (building)
LanguageData.RFFPlasticreteWall_Frame.description: The ultimate in defensive fortifications, this massive reinforced wall is constructed from layers of concrete, steel and plasteel.
LanguageData.Embrasure.label: embrasure
LanguageData.Embrasure.description: An impassable wall with openings to allow warlike pawns to shoot at each other. (Also acts as a permanently-open vent, equalizing temperatures on both sides of the wall.)
LanguageData.Embrasure_Blueprint.label: embrasure (blueprint)
LanguageData.Embrasure_Frame.label: embrasure (building)
LanguageData.Embrasure_Frame.description: An impassable wall with openings to allow warlike pawns to shoot at each other. (Also acts as a permanently-open vent, equalizing temperatures on both sides of the wall.)
LanguageData.BrickEmbrasure.label: brick embrasure
LanguageData.BrickEmbrasure.description: A brick wall with openings to allow warlike pawns to shoot at each other. (Also acts as a permanently-open vent, equalizing temperatures on both sides of the wall.)
LanguageData.BrickEmbrasure_Blueprint.label: brick embrasure (blueprint)
LanguageData.BrickEmbrasure_Frame.label: brick embrasure (building)
LanguageData.BrickEmbrasure_Frame.description: A brick wall with openings to allow warlike pawns to shoot at each other. (Also acts as a permanently-open vent, equalizing temperatures on both sides of the wall.)
LanguageData.RFFConcreteEmbrasure.label: steel-reinforced concrete embrasure
LanguageData.RFFConcreteEmbrasure.description: A bunker wall with openings to allow warlike pawns to shoot at each other. (Also acts as a permanently-open vent, equalizing temperatures on both sides of the wall.)
LanguageData.RFFConcreteEmbrasure_Blueprint.label: steel-reinforced concrete embrasure (blueprint)
LanguageData.RFFConcreteEmbrasure_Frame.label: steel-reinforced concrete embrasure (building)
LanguageData.RFFConcreteEmbrasure_Frame.description: A bunker wall with openings to allow warlike pawns to shoot at each other. (Also acts as a permanently-open vent, equalizing temperatures on both sides of the wall.)

LanguageData.RFFPlasticreteEmbrasure.description: A plasteel-reinforced concrete bunker wall with openings to allow warlike pawns to shoot at each other. (Also acts as a permanently-open vent, equalizing temperatures on both sides of the wall.)
